definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu

sentences.english: Stellite 6 seating faces for long service life.
sentences.chinese: 钨铬钴合金6阀座面，使用寿命更长。
焊接连接阀座采用钨铬钴合金6阀座面。

sentences.english: Cu-W composite and its use in metal hot working;
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同球磨时间对钨铜复合材料性能的影响。

sentences.english: The Pyrite is one of main typomorphic characteristic of W-Sb-Au deposits series of western Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 黄铁矿是湘西钨锑金矿床系列的主要标型矿物之一。

sentences.english: The IDC has a more uniform work function distribution than an oxide cathode.
sentences.chinese: 氧化物阴极的逸出功分布比钡钨阴极更不均匀。

sentences.english: This approach is a high efficient and economic technology for composite parts.
sentences.chinese: 是一种制造钨铜材料复合件既经济又高效的工艺方法。

sentences.english: It provides higher abrasion resistance compared to tungsten carbide at the expense of some toughness.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了更高的耐磨性比钨在硬质合金牺牲一些韧性。

sentences.english: Ternary tungsten-tellurite glass system was researched in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了掺铒钨碲酸盐玻璃的吸收光谱和荧光光谱。

sentences.english: Shaker concentrate containing a large number of sulfide ore, floating sulfur before floating scheelite.
sentences.chinese: 摇床精矿含有大量的硫化矿，浮白钨之前先浮硫。

sentences.english: The enrichment and recovery of tantalum and niobium through acid leaching and sodium alkali fusing from tungsten residue is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸浸与钠碱熔融法从钨渣中富集和回收钽铌。

sentences.english: The present invention involves bilayers that include cesium tungsten oxide as an infrared absorbing agent.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及包含作为红外线吸收剂的氧化铯钨的双层。

sentences.english: Ultrasonic testing technology for high-density tungsten alloy parts was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍高密度钨基合金部件的超声检测技术。

sentences.english: The results show that Cu solubilizes in W and the substitutional solid solution is formed.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现，铜固溶在钨中，并形成了置换固溶体。

sentences.english: This paper reports a CMOS compatible tungsten micro-hotplate.
sentences.chinese: 本文设计了一种与标准CMOS工艺兼容的钨微热板。

sentences.english: Erbium ion-doped tungstentellurite glass was fabricated and characterized by absorption spectrum and fluorescence spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 研究了掺铒钨碲酸盐玻璃的吸收光谱和荧光光谱。

sentences.english: Characteristics of Scandate cathodes with Scandia doped tungsten bodies have been investigated in this work.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究具有氧化钪掺杂钨基体钪酸盐阴极的性能。
